sentences.en: Adrian: Really? I would never take you for a handyman. Is It'some of your handiwork?
sentences.cn: 阿德里恩: 真的 吗 ?我从未当你是个手工匠, 这件是你的作品 吗 ?

sentences.en: Anyway , are you going to get a handyman to install this stuff?
sentences.cn: 你要找人帮忙安装这些东西 吗 ?

sentences.en: Gordon : So, you've finally come to my place. You know , I am a home handyman.
sentences.cn: 戈登: 你终于来参观我家了. 我可是家里的巧手工匠哦.

sentences.en: He is an invaluable handyman to have about the place.
sentences.cn: 他是这一带非常可贵的巧手.

sentences.en: He worked variously as a handyman, carpenter, and waiter.
sentences.cn: 他做过各种工作,如杂役, 木工, 侍者等.

sentences.en: His dad has always been a handyman. He can fix anything and everything in the house.
sentences.cn: 他爸爸一直是个心灵手巧的人, 屋子里的任何东西他都能修.

sentences.en: Hugh was leading a catch - as - catch - can life , working as an itinerant handyman.
sentences.cn: 休靠当流动临时工凑合着过活.

sentences.en: Max: Simon! My favorite handyman! Can you look at my oven? It's not working right.
sentences.cn: 麦克斯: 赛门! 我最爱的巧手大师! 你可以帮我看看烤箱 吗 ?它运作不太正常.

sentences.en: So you're a handyman and a fugitive architect?
sentences.cn: 这么说你是个开锁匠,和逃亡建筑师?

sentences.en: T : So , you must be the handyman who takes any dirty job, am I correct?
sentences.cn: 你就是会接任何脏工作的临时工, 是 吧 ?

sentences.en: The handyman closed the hole in the wall with plaster.
sentences.cn: 工人用灰泥填补墙上的洞.

sentences.en: They started me off in the gardens as a handyman. Digging, forking manure, that kind of thing.
sentences.cn: 他们让我先在园子里干些杂活，挖土、叉粪肥之类的。

sentences.en: We have to call a handyman to unblock the pipe.
sentences.cn: 我们必须叫个杂工把水管通一通.

words.tran_cn: 手巧的人；[劳经]杂务工；水手

trans.tran_cn: 受雇做杂事的人，做零活的人，能工巧匠
trans.tran_en: someone who is good at doing repairs and practical jobs in the house
